category.name: Test for Follows(*), Parent(*), Modifies, Uses,pattern

id.comment: Select while loops that are nested in other while when an assignment modifies l and uses 9.

query.querystr: while w; assign a; Select w such that Follows(_,w) pattern a("l",_"9"_);

id.comment: Select assignment a1 that is followed by assignment a2 modifies i and uses i.

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select a1 such that Follows*(a1,a2) pattern a2("i",_"i"_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists a Uses relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Parent(w,10) pattern w("f",_);

id.comment: Select statement s if it modifies y when there is while loop has control var k.

query.querystr: stmt s;while w; Select s such that Modifies(s,"y") pattern w("k",_);

id.comment: Select assignment a1 if there exists an assignment a2 with d =10?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select a1 such that Modifies(a2,"d") pattern a2("d","10");

id.comment: Select while if it modifies l and there exists an assignment modifies variable y and uses y?

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select w such that Modifies(w,"l") pattern a("y",_"y"_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable c and there exists while loop using x as control variable?

query.querystr: stmt s; while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(s,"c") pattern w("x",_);

id.comment: Which is the assigment modifies c uses e and z?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a,"e") pattern a("e",_"z"_);

id.comment: Which is the while uses x as control variable?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(w,"x") pattern w("x",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c and follows some statements?

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; Select s such that Uses(s,"q") pattern a("f",_"2"_);
